definition: involving or characterized by harmony, any of a series of musical tones whose frequencies are integral multiples of the frequency of a fundamental
details:
adjective
- involving or characterized by harmony
= synonyms: consonant
- relating to vibrations that occur as a result of vibrations in a nearby body
= synonyms: sympathetic
- of or relating to harmony as distinct from melody and rhythm
= example: of or relating to harmony as distinct from melody and rhythm
- of or relating to the branch of acoustics that studies the composition of musical sounds
= example: of or relating to the branch of acoustics that studies the composition of musical sounds
- of or relating to harmonics
noun
- any of a series of musical tones whose frequencies are integral multiples of the frequency of a fundamental
- a tone that is a component of a complex sound
